Class PanelManager

java.lang.Object
ui.PanelManager
public class PanelManager extends Object
The PanelManager class is responsible for managing the different panels in the application's user interface. It allows switching between the title screen, player selection, battle, and credits panels, and updates the main frame accordingly.

  • Method Details

    • changeToPlayerSelection

      public static void changeToPlayerSelection()
      Switches the main frame to the player selection panel. This removes all existing components and adds the player selection panel.

    • changeToTittleScreen

      public static void changeToTittleScreen()
      Switches the main frame to the title screen panel. This removes all existing components and adds the title screen panel.
